name: THE COLD WAR ERA
blurb: Military might, stealthy spies, blatant propaganda, and high-tech Space Race marvels are all at war game lovers' fingertips!

rewards.reward: A really big THANK YOU! for supporting intelligent Grand Strategy games like TCWE, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made. Through your donation you support not just us, but also the spirit of independent game design. We're here to prove that Grand Strategy games have something great to offer and your dollars help us do that.

A big THANK YOU for supporting intelligent Grand Strategy games like TCWE, a high-quality recording of the game's soundtrack (great Cold War mood music!) as a gift for your gratitude, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made.
One Standard Edition copy of The Cold War Era, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made.
One Special Edition copy of The Cold War Era, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made.

\u201cOrden Lenina\u201d Medal Package. Includes -- one Standard Edition copy of TCWE, your name listed among the \u201cOrden Lenina\u201d Supporters in the game lobby, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made.

\u201cHero of USSR\u201d Medal Package. Includes \u2013 one Special Edition copy of the game, your name and picture (or any image you provide other than company logos) in the \u201cHero of USSR\u201d Supporters list in the game lobby, plus three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made.

\u201cPurple Star\u201d Medal Package. Includes \u2013 one Special Edition copy of TCWE, your name and picture (or any image you provide other than a company logo) in the list of \u201cPurple Star\u201d Supporters in the game lobby, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made. The \u201cPurple Star\u201d Supporters list will also be posted on our website on the DOWNLOAD page!

\u201cComrade General Secretary\u201d Package. Includes \u2013 one Special Edition copy of the game, your name and picture (or any image you provide) in the list of \u201cPurple Star\u201d Supporters in the game lobby, your business logo (or your name and picture) on the game's startup screen below the ALINA DIGITAL logo, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made. The \u201cPurple Star\u201d Supporters will also be posted on our website on the DOWNLOAD page!

\u201cPresidential\u201d Package. Includes \u2013 one Special Edition copy of TCWE, your name and picture (or any image you provide) in the \u201cPurple Star\u201d Supporters list in the game lobby, your business logo (or your name and picture) on the game's startup screen below the ALINA DIGITAL logo, plus a three-day demo version of the game you'll receive the same day your contribution is made. The \u201cPurple Star\u201d Supporters list will be posted on our website's DOWNLOAD page. Your 5-second video of you or your business (with logo or picture) will appear in the game's TV stream, and will replay several times during gameplay. Videos will also be posted on our website's DOWNLOAD page, at our Facebook page, and on The Cold War Era's YouTube channel!
